evergreen.name: Flying
evergreen.description: Can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach
evergreen.reminder: This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

evergreen.name: First Strike
evergreen.description: Deals combat damage before creatures without first strike
evergreen.reminder: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

evergreen.name: Double Strike
evergreen.description: Deals both first strike and regular combat damage
evergreen.reminder: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

evergreen.name: Deathtouch
evergreen.description: Any amount of damage dealt by this is lethal
evergreen.reminder: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

evergreen.name: Haste
evergreen.description: Can attack and tap the turn it enters
evergreen.reminder: This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.

evergreen.name: Hexproof
evergreen.description: Cannot be targeted by opponents' spells or abilities
evergreen.reminder: This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

evergreen.name: Indestructible
evergreen.description: Cannot be destroyed by damage or 'destroy' effects
evergreen.reminder: Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this.

evergreen.name: Lifelink
evergreen.description: Damage dealt also gains you that much life
evergreen.reminder: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

evergreen.name: Menace
evergreen.description: Cannot be blocked except by two or more creatures
evergreen.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

evergreen.name: Reach
evergreen.reminder: This creature can block creatures with flying.

evergreen.name: Trample
evergreen.description: Excess combat damage is dealt to the defending player
evergreen.reminder: This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

evergreen.name: Vigilance
evergreen.description: Attacking doesn't cause this to tap
evergreen.reminder: Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.

evergreen.name: Flash
evergreen.description: Can be cast at instant speed
evergreen.reminder: You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.

evergreen.name: Ward
evergreen.description: Opponents pay a cost when targeting this
evergreen.reminder: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays the ward cost.

evergreen.name: Protection
evergreen.description: Cannot be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by sources of the specified quality
evergreen.reminder: This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of the specified quality.

deciduous.name: Equip
deciduous.description: Attach equipment to a creature you control
deciduous.reminder: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.

deciduous.name: Fight
deciduous.description: Two creatures deal damage equal to their power to each other
deciduous.reminder: Each creature deals damage equal to its power to the other.

deciduous.name: Mill
deciduous.description: Put cards from library into graveyard
deciduous.reminder: Put the top cards of your library into your graveyard.

deciduous.name: Scry
deciduous.description: Look at top cards and put on top or bottom
deciduous.reminder: Look at the top cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.

deciduous.name: Surveil
deciduous.description: Look at top cards, may put in graveyard, rest on top
deciduous.reminder: Look at the top cards of your library. You may put any number of them into your graveyard. Put the rest on top of your library in any order.

deciduous.name: Cycling
deciduous.reminder: You may pay the cycling cost and discard this card to draw a card.

deciduous.name: Kicker
deciduous.description: Optional additional cost for enhanced effect
deciduous.reminder: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell.

deciduous.name: Flashback
deciduous.reminder: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.

common.name: Affinity
common.description: Costs less for each permanent of a type
common.reminder: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each permanent of the specified type you control.

common.name: Annihilator
common.description: Defending player sacrifices permanents when attacking
common.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices that many permanents.

common.name: Cascade
common.description: Exile cards until you exile a cheaper nonland card, may cast it free
common.reminder: When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast it without paying its mana cost.

common.name: Convoke
common.description: Creatures can help cast this spell
common.reminder: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.

common.name: Delve
common.description: Exile cards from graveyard to pay generic mana
common.reminder: Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.

common.name: Emerge
common.description: Sacrifice a creature to reduce cost
common.reminder: You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.

common.name: Entwine
common.description: Pay extra to use all modes
common.reminder: Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.

common.name: Exploit
common.description: May sacrifice a creature when this enters
common.reminder: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.

common.name: Exalted
common.description: Creature attacking alone gets bonus
common.reminder: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

common.name: Extort
common.description: Pay W/B when casting to drain life
common.reminder: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

common.name: Fabricate
common.description: Choose +1/+1 counters or Servo tokens
common.reminder: When this creature enters the battlefield, put that many +1/+1 counters on it or create that many 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

common.name: Fear
common.description: Can only be blocked by artifact or black creatures
common.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.

common.name: Fuse
common.description: Can cast both halves of split card
common.reminder: You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.

common.name: Improvise
common.description: Artifacts can help cast this spell
common.reminder: Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap while casting this spell pays for {1}.

common.name: Infect
common.description: Deals damage as -1/-1 counters or poison counters
common.reminder: This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.

common.name: Intimidate
common.description: Can only be blocked by artifact or same-color creatures
common.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.

common.name: Living Weapon
common.description: Equipment enters attached to a 0/0 Phyrexian Germ
common.reminder: When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.

common.name: Madness
common.description: Can cast when discarding for alternate cost
common.reminder: If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.

common.name: Miracle
common.description: Can cast for reduced cost if it's first card drawn
common.reminder: You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.

common.name: Modular
common.description: Enters with counters, transfers them on death
common.reminder: This creature enters the battlefield with +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.

common.name: Morph
common.description: Cast face down, can turn face up later
common.reminder: You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.

common.name: Mutate
common.description: Merge with a non-Human creature
common.reminder: If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.

common.name: Ninjutsu
common.description: Return an unblocked attacker to hand to put this onto battlefield
common.reminder: Pay the ninjutsu cost, return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.

common.name: Offering
common.description: Sacrifice a creature of specified type to reduce cost
common.reminder: You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a creature of the specified type and paying the difference in mana costs.

common.name: Overload
common.description: Pay more to affect all valid targets
common.reminder: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."

common.name: Persist
common.description: Returns from death with -1/-1 counter if it had none
common.reminder: When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.

common.name: Phasing
common.description: Phases in and out each turn
common.reminder: This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps.

common.name: Proliferate
common.description: Add counters to permanents/players that have them
common.reminder: Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.

common.name: Prowess
common.description: Gets +1/+1 until end of turn when noncreature spell cast
common.reminder: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

common.name: Raid
common.description: Bonus if you attacked this turn
common.reminder: If you attacked this turn, this spell has an additional effect.

common.name: Rebound
common.description: If cast from hand, cast again next upkeep free
common.reminder: If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.

common.name: Regenerate
common.description: Instead of dying, tap and remove from combat
common.reminder: The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.

common.name: Renown
common.description: Gets +1/+1 counters when dealing combat damage to player
common.reminder: When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put that many +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.

common.name: Replicate
common.description: Pay additional cost to copy the spell
common.reminder: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.

common.name: Retrace
common.description: Cast from graveyard by discarding a land
common.reminder: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.

common.name: Revolt
common.description: Bonus if a permanent you controlled left battlefield
common.reminder: If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, this spell has an additional effect.

common.name: Riot
common.description: Choose haste or +1/+1 counter when entering
common.reminder: This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.

common.name: Shadow
common.description: Can only block/be blocked by shadow creatures
common.reminder: This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.

common.name: Shroud
common.description: Cannot be targeted by any spells or abilities
common.reminder: This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.

common.name: Skulk
common.description: Can't be blocked by creatures with greater power
common.reminder: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.

common.name: Soulbond
common.description: Pairs with another unpaired creature
common.reminder: You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.

common.name: Spectacle
common.description: Alternate cost if opponent lost life
common.reminder: You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.

common.name: Storm
common.description: Copy for each spell cast before this turn
common.reminder: When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

common.name: Suspend
common.description: Exile with time counters, cast when last counter removed
common.reminder: Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay the suspend cost and exile it with time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.

common.name: Totem Armor
common.description: Instead of enchanted creature being destroyed, destroy aura
common.reminder: If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.

common.name: Training
common.description: Gets +1/+1 counter when attacking with greater power creature
common.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

common.name: Transfigure
common.description: Sacrifice to search for creature with same mana value
common.reminder: Pay the transfigure cost, sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a creature card with the same mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

common.name: Transform
common.description: Flip to other face of double-faced card
common.reminder: Transform this permanent into its other face.

common.name: Transmute
common.description: Discard to search for card with same mana value
common.reminder: Pay the transmute cost, discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

common.name: Tribute
common.description: Opponent may put counters to prevent effect
common.reminder: As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put +1/+1 counters on it. If they don't, this creature has an ability.

common.name: Undying
common.description: Returns from death with +1/+1 counter if it had none
common.reminder: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

common.name: Unearth
common.description: Return from graveyard until end of turn
common.reminder: Pay the unearth cost: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield.

common.name: Vanishing
common.description: Time counters, sacrifice when last removed
common.reminder: This permanent enters the battlefield with time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.

common.name: Wither
common.description: Damage dealt is in form of -1/-1 counters
common.reminder: This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.
